content: this cute crochet button pouch is worked in a rectangle using singe crochet stitches with a flap construction that will include a button hole for closure it is perfect for carrying all of your crochet hooks but can also be used for anything else such as a makeup pouch toy pouch pencil pouch the possibilities are endless recommended yarn is less than 1 skein of i love this yarn by hobby lobby but can use any worsted weight yarn it also uses a size h crochet hook
